name: Heist In Time
description:
Heist In Time is a stealth game where you play as Shawn, a clumsy thief who hates his job. When he was performing a certain mission, he uninctentionally activates a Time Travel device that makes him travel through different ages.

Join Shawn and his "Time Mates" in various missions across different time periods to help him to return to its own age and save the world.

Features

  • Stealth based gameplay.
  • Various characters with unique abilities.
  • Multiple levels in different time periods.
  • Cinematic storytelling.
